intra_panel_references.referenced_field: Select the process type
intra_panel_references.logic_description: IF India is selected in 'Select the process type' then value is DOM IN, If international is selected then value is INT

conditions.when: Select the process type = India
Select the process type = International

intra_panel_references.referenced_field: Account Group/Vendor Type

conditions.when: Account Group/Vendor Type is selected
conditions.then: Group key/Corporate Group dropdown is filtered based on selection

intra_panel_references.referenced_field: Account Group/Vendor Type
intra_panel_references.logic_description: If account group/vendor type is selected as ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, ZONE (any one) then derived it as Domestic. If Account group/vendor type is selected as ZIMP, ZSTV, ZDAS (any one) then derived it as import

conditions.when: Account Group/Vendor Type IN [ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, ZONE]
Account Group/Vendor Type IN [ZIMP, ZSTV, ZDAS]

Select the process type = International

referenced_fields.reference_context: If duplicate vendor found based on Duplicate GST then Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory
If duplicate vendor found based on PAN Card then Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory
If duplicate vendor found based on Email Id then Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory
If duplicate vendor found based on Mobile Number then Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory
If duplicate vendor found based on Bank Account Number then Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory

intra_panel_references.dependency_summary: The Exception Duplicate Vendor creation checkbox becomes mandatory when any of the 5 duplicate check result fields indicate a duplicate was found (GST, PAN, Email, Mobile, Bank Account Number)

referenced_fields.reference_context: Justification field is semantically linked to the Exception Duplicate Vendor creation checkbox - justification is typically required when exception is checked

intra_panel_references.dependency_summary: The Justification field is semantically related to the Exception Duplicate Vendor creation checkbox and would logically be required when the exception is requested

intra_panel_references.logic_description: If 'Is Vendor Your Customer?' is YES, then Customer Code is visible and mandatory, else hidden

conditions.effect: Customer Code is visible and mandatory
